alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 12:00PM MST until November 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. Higher amounts are possible along the south side of Casper and in the foothills of Casper Mountain. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening and morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
